fields.description:
The testSendingMediumMessage and testSendingLargeMessage test cases fail for both of these as shown below.  

UnreliableUdpTransportTest uses org.apache.activemq.transport.reliable.ReliableTransport, which is deprecated.  Should we continue to run these tests?

-------------------------------------------------------
 T E S T S
-------------------------------------------------------
Running org.apache.activemq.transport.multicast.MulticastTransportTest
Tests run: 3, Failures: 2, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 40.6 sec <<< FAILURE! - in org.apache.activemq.transport.multicast.MulticastTransportTest
